1.name: Hellboy
1.description: A demon, raised from infancy after being conjured by and rescued from the Nazis, grows up to become a defender against the forces of darkness.

2.name: Troy
2.description: An adaptation of Homer's great epic, the film follows the assault on Troy by the united Greek forces and chronicles the fates of the men involved.

3.name: The Notebook
3.description: A poor yet passionate young man falls in love with a rich young woman, giving her a sense of freedom, but they are soon separated because of their social differences.

4.name: Mean Girls
4.description: Cady Heron is a hit with The Plastics, the A-list girl clique at her new school, until she makes the mistake of falling for Aaron Samuels, the ex-boyfriend of alpha Plastic Regina George.

5.name: The Incredibles
5.description: A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world.

6.name: The Passion of the Christ
6.description: Depicts the final twelve hours in the life of Jesus of Nazareth, on the day of his crucifixion in Jerusalem.

7.name: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
7.description: A group of misfits enter a Las Vegas dodgeball tournament in order to save their cherished local gym from the onslaught of a corporate health fitness chain.

8.name: Howl's Moving Castle
8.description: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

9.name: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
9.description: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories.

10.name: Van Helsing
10.description: The notorious monster hunter is sent to Transylvania to stop Count Dracula who is using Dr. Frankenstein's research and a werewolf for some sinister purpose.

11.name: Shaun of the Dead
11.description: A man's uneventful life is disrupted by the zombie apocalypse.

12.name: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
12.description: It's Harry's third year at Hogwarts; not only does he have a new "Defense Against the Dark Arts" teacher, but there is also trouble brewing. Convicted murderer Sirius Black has escaped the Wizards' Prison and is coming after Harry.

13.name: White Chicks
13.description: Two disgraced FBI agents go way undercover in an effort to protect hotel heiresses the Wilson Sisters from a kidnapping plot.

14.name: Layer Cake
14.description: A successful cocaine dealer gets two tough assignments from his boss on the eve of his planned early retirement.

15.name: The Girl Next Door
15.description: A teenager's dreams come true when a former porn star moves in next door and they fall in love.

16.name: The Aviator
16.description: A biopic depicting the early years of legendary Director and aviator Howard Hughes' career from the late 1920s to the mid 1940s.

17.name: 50 First Dates
17.description: Henry Roth is a man afraid of commitment up until he meets the beautiful Lucy. They hit it off and Henry think he's finally found the girl of his dreams, until he discovers she has short-term memory loss and forgets him the next day.

18.name: The Butterfly Effect
18.description: Evan Treborn suffers blackouts during significant events of his life. As he grows up, he finds a way to remember these lost memories and a supernatural way to alter his life by reading his journal.

19.name: Dawn of the Dead
19.description: A nurse, a policeman, a young married couple, a salesman, and other survivors of a worldwide plague that is producing aggressive, flesh-eating zombies, take refuge in a mega Midwestern shopping mall.

20.name: The Village
20.description: A series of events tests the beliefs of a small isolated countryside village.

21.name: 13 Going on 30
21.description: A girl makes a wish on her thirteenth birthday, and wakes up the next day as a thirty-year-old woman.

22.name: The Punisher
22.description: An undercover FBI agent becomes a vigilante assassin and sets out to unleash his wrath upon the corrupt businessman who slaughtered his entire family at a reunion.

23.name: Kung Fu Hustle
23.description: In Shanghai, China in the 1940s, a wannabe gangster aspires to join the notorious "Axe Gang" while residents of a housing complex exhibit extraordinary powers in defending their turf.

24.name: The Machinist
24.description: An industrial worker who hasn't slept in a year begins to doubt his own sanity.

25.name: Saw
25.description: Two strangers, who awaken in a room with no recollection of how they got there, soon discover they're pawns in a deadly game perpetrated by a notorious serial killer.

26.name: Crash
26.description: Los Angeles citizens with vastly separate lives collide in interweaving stories of race, loss and redemption.

27.name: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
27.description: The Bride continues her quest of vengeance against her former boss and lover Bill, the reclusive bouncer Budd, and the treacherous, one-eyed Elle.

28.name: Napoleon Dynamite
28.description: A listless and alienated teenager decides to help his new friend win the class presidency in their small western high school, while he must deal with his bizarre family life back home.

29.name: Hotel Rwanda
29.description: Paul Rusesabagina was a hotel manager who housed over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda.

30.name: The Phantom of the Opera
30.description: A young soprano becomes the obsession of a disfigured and murderous musical genius who lives beneath the Paris Opéra House.

31.name: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
31.description: Ron Burgundy is San Diego's top-rated newsman in the male-dominated broadcasting of the 1970s, but that's all about to change for Ron and his cronies when an ambitious woman is hired as a new anchor.

32.name: Downfall
32.description: Traudl Junge, the final secretary for Adolf Hitler, tells of the Nazi dictator's final days in his Berlin bunker at the end of WWII.

33.name: Spider-Man 2
33.description: Peter Parker is beset with troubles in his failing personal life as he battles a brilliant scientist named Doctor Otto Octavius.

34.name: I, Robot
34.description: In 2035, a technophobic cop investigates a crime that may have been perpetrated by a robot, which leads to a larger threat to humanity.

35.name: Million Dollar Baby
35.description: A determined woman works with a hardened boxing trainer to become a professional.

36.name: Collateral
36.description: A cab driver finds himself the hostage of an engaging contract killer as he makes his rounds from hit to hit during one night in Los Angeles.

37.name: Alexander
37.description: Alexander, the King of Macedonia and one of the greatest army leaders in the history of warfare, conquers much of the known world.

38.name: Closer
38.description: The relationships of two couples become complicated and deceitful when the man from one couple meets the woman of the other.

39.name: Shrek 2
39.description: Princess Fiona's parents invite her and Shrek to dinner to celebrate her marriage. If only they knew the newlyweds were both ogres.

40.name: EuroTrip
40.description: Dumped by his girlfriend, a high school grad decides to embark on an overseas adventure in Europe with his friends.

41.name: King Arthur
41.description: A demystified take on the tale of King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table.

42.name: Man on Fire
42.description: In Mexico City, a former assassin swears vengeance on those who committed an unspeakable act against the family he was hired to protect.

43.name: Blade: Trinity
43.description: Blade, now a wanted man by the FBI, must join forces with the Nightstalkers to face his most challenging enemy yet: Dracula.

44.name: The Day After Tomorrow
44.description: Jack Hall, paleoclimatologist, must make a daring trek from Washington, D.C. to New York City to reach his son, trapped in the cross-hairs of a sudden international storm which plunges the planet into a new Ice Age.

45.name: A Series of Unfortunate Events
45.description: When a massive fire kills their parents, three children are delivered to the custody of cousin and stage actor Count Olaf, who is secretly plotting to steal their parents' vast fortune.

46.name: The Bourne Supremacy
46.description: When Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone awry, he is forced to resume his former life as a trained assassin to survive.

47.name: National Treasure
47.description: A historian races to find the legendary Templar Treasure before a team of mercenaries.

48.name: The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou
48.description: With a plan to exact revenge on a mythical shark that killed his partner, Oceanographer Steve Zissou rallies a crew that includes his estranged wife, a journalist, and a man who may or may not be his son.

49.name: Walking Tall
49.description: A former U.S. soldier returns to his hometown to find it overrun by crime and corruption, which prompts him to clean house.

50.name: A Cinderella Story
50.description: Routinely exploited by her wicked stepmother, the downtrodden Sam Montgomery is excited about the prospect of meeting her Internet beau at the school's Halloween dance.
